original_solution_mapping.L2: Mrs. McPherson will pay $360 leaving $1200-$360 = $<<1200-360=840>>840 which Mr. McPherson will have to raise

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6456.
    Returns: the amount Mr. McPherson needs to raise to complete the rent.
    """
    # L1
    mrs_mcpherson_percentage = Fraction(30, 100) # 30% of the money
    total_rent = 1200 # rent is $1200 per year
    mrs_mcpherson_contribution = mrs_mcpherson_percentage * total_rent

    # L2
    mr_mcpherson_contribution = total_rent - mrs_mcpherson_contribution

    # FA
    answer = mr_mcpherson_contribution
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Mrs. McPherson will pay ${mrs_mcpherson_contribution} leaving ${total_rent}-${mrs_mcpherson_contribution} = $<<{total_rent}-{mrs_mcpherson_contribution}={mr_mcpherson_contribution}>>{mr_mcpherson_contribution} which Mr. McPherson will have to raise

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Mrs. McPherson will pay $1/4000 leaving $1200-$1/4000 = $<<1200-1/4000=4799999/4000>>4799999/4000 which Mr. McPherson will have to raise

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '/' instead.
